title: Oasis Restaurant and Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Western, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located at Apartotel Maria Alexandra, from Vivero Exotica 100 N and 125 W. Cozy atmosphere with Wi-Fi and book exchange. Has vegetarian and vegan appetizers, pizza, sandwiches, main courses, vegan pastries such as lemon pie, beet cake, chocolate cake with soy whipped cream. Reportedly re-opened Sept 2011.
streetAddress: San Rafael de Escazu, Trejos Montealegre
